name: Energize Playtest Demo
description:
This page is where all minor or major changes are posted during the development of Energize in order to receive feedback through playtesting. Bug reports, recommendations, questions, comments, concerns, etc are welcome in the comments on this page.  

All feedback is also welcome on the Discord server for SingleShot Games.  On the Discord server, you will receive notifications on any updates to this page, updates to our other games,  and a place to discuss and interact with the rest of the community!

Your constant feedback is an important part of the development of this game, so revisiting this page often and giving feedback would be very appreciated.

Thank you for your time.
